items.title: Fish Feed And Grow Cheats
items.text: i'm gonna show you guys guys how to cheat in fish feed and grow and it's all okay because fish feed and grow made it by themselves so first you go into the laundry then you press mods cheat mod and then you can see everything you need to do then you press play and then you just get in probably gonna take some time and when you're in you can just play what you want and in this um version um survival mode then you just get food from l plus u or u plus l but in deathmatch deathmatch then you get levels by place pressing it so if you see if i go in depthmatch here and choose easy and then it's gonna load gonna take some time . so when it's in i gotta select the fish space and then i'm just gonna l plus you and then i can grow and grow and l plus i then then you can get coins so much so that's pretty pretty cool and d plus x then you can kill yourself.
